participant_1.name: Emma Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and hands-on, Emma enjoys the satisfaction of completing projects and values her solitary hobbies.
participant_1.background: I love working with my hands and getting to see the creative process through to completion. I love books. I have never traveled out of the country. Ferrari is my favorite car company. Coffee and books are my best friends.

participant_2.name: Liam Johnson
participant_2.personality: Liam is imaginative and expressive, often channeling his creativity through dressing up and caring for animals.
participant_2.background: I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime. My girlfriend lives in the condo next door. I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies. I babysit for the woman who lives next door. I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.

content.text: I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It is, it's a great way to express myself creatively.
I love to work with my hands, I've never been one for dressing up though.
What kinds of things do you like to make?
I like to make jewelry, I've also been working on building my own computer.
Oh that's really cool! I'm not very good at working with my hands, I'm more of an artist.
Well, I'm not much of an artist, but I love to read.
Me too! I love to read comics and manga.
I prefer novels, I love to get lost in a good story.
I love to get lost in a good story too, that's why I love comics and manga so much.
I've never read any manga, I've heard good things though.
You should check it out! It's like comics, but they're Japanese.
I will! I'm always looking for new things to read.
Great! I'm sure you'll love it.
